dmca.title: URGENT: Re: DMCA Complaint from Grayzone.com media.putfile.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Dorothy Sherman | GrayZone, Inc. [mailto:grayzone@grayzone.com] 
Posted At: Tuesday, September 19, 2006 9:50 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: URGENT: Re: DMCA Complaint from Grayzone.com
media.putfile.com
Subject: URGENT: Re: DMCA Complaint from Grayzone.com media.putfile.com
Importance: High


ToWhom It May Concern:

We are STILL ABLE TO ACCESS THE MATERIAL from the below referenced link.

Please DISABLE IT ASAP:

 http://media.putfile.com/Buckcherry-Crazy-Bitch19

D. Sherman
President
GrayZone, Inc.
www.grayzone.com
on behalf of Atlantic Records Group



----- Original Message -----
From: <legal-response@theplanet.com>
To: <GrayZone@grayzone.com>; <copyright@theplanet.com>
Sent: Monday, September 18, 2006 6:31 PM
Subject: DMCA Complaint from Grayzone.com media.putfile.com


> To Whom It May Concern:
>
> This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your 
> below-pasted complaint has been disabled.
>
> Legal Response Team
> The Planet
>
>
>
> ---------
>
>
> From: planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
> [mailto:planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com] On Behalf Of Dorothy

> Sherman | GrayZone, Inc.
> Sent: Sunday, September 17, 2006 12:09 PM
> To: put@putfile.com; Admins; abuse
> Subject: [ADMINS] URGENT!!! SECOND NOTICE OF INFRINGEMENT AND 
> DECLARATION:ATLANTIC RECORDS GROUP/BUCKCHERRY 'Crazy Bitch'
[putfile.com]
> Importance: High
>
>
>
> SECOND NOTICE OF INFRINGEMENT AND DECLARATION:  ATLANTIC RECORDS 
> GROUP/BUCKCHERRY 'Crazy Bitch' [putfile.com]
> REGARDING:
>
> Registrant:
>   Putfile Ltd.
>   Putfile Ltd. Roffe Swayne
>   Ashcombe Court, Woolsack Way
>   Godalming, Surrey  GU71LQ
>   GB
>
>   Registrar: NAMESDIRECT
>   Domain Name: PUTFILE.COM

>
>   Administrative, Technical Contact:
>      Ltd, Putfile  put@putfile.com
>      Putfile Ltd.
>      Putfile Ltd. Roffe Swayne
>      Ashcombe Court, Woolsack Way
>      Godalming, Surrey  GU71LQ
>      GB
>      448704321233
>
>
>   Domain servers in listed order:
>      NS1.GPNAMESERVER.COM
>      NS2.GPNAMESERVER.COM
>
> End of Whois Information
>
> Network Whois record
> Queried whois.arin.net with "70.86.198.56"...

> OrgID:      TPCM
> Address:    1333 North Stemmons Freeway
> Address:    Suite 110
> City:       Dallas
> StateProv:  TX
> PostalCode: 75207
> Country:    US
>
> ReferralServer: rwhois://rwhois.theplanet.com:4321
>
> NetRange:   70.84.0.0 - 70.87.255.255
> CIDR:       70.84.0.0/14
> NetName:    NETBLK-THEPLANET-BLK-13

> Parent:     NET-70-0-0-0-0
> NetType:    Direct Allocation

> NameServer: NS2.THEPLANET.COM

> RTechHandle: PP46-ARIN
> RTechName:   Pathos, Peter
> RTechPhone:  +1-214-782-7800

> OrgAbuseName:   Abuse
> OrgAbusePhone:  +1-214-782-7802

>

> OrgNOCName:   Technical Support
> OrgNOCPhone:  +1-214-782-7800
> OrgNOCEmail:  admins@theplanet.com
>
> OrgTechHandle: TECHN33-ARIN
> OrgTechName:   Technical Support
> OrgTechPhone:  +1-214-782-7800
> OrgTechEmail:  admins@theplanet.com <mailto:admins@theplanet.com>
>
>
> REGARDING:
>
> http://media.putfile.com/Buckcherry-CrazyBitch
> <http://media.putfile.com/Buckcherry-CrazyBitch>
>
> http://media.putfile.com/Buckcherry-Crazy-Bitch19
> <http://media.putfile.com/Buckcherry-Crazy-Bitch19>
>
>
> UNAUTHORIZED BUCKCHERRY 'CRAZY BITCH' VIDEO
>
> IMMEDIATELY REMOVE THE FOLLOWING UNAUTHORIZED VIDEOS INCLUDING ALL
LINKS 
> AND REFERENCES.
>
> THIS VIDEO IS NOT THE APPROVED VERSION AND INFRINGES UPON THE
COPYRIGHT OF 
> ATLANTIC RECORDING CORP. AND THE ARTISTS BUCKCHERRY:
>
> If you do not comply with this demand immediately, we will seek
whatever 
> remedies are available to us under the United States Copyright law,
the 
> Lanham Act and any applicable international laws or treaties.
>
> ATLANTIC RECORDS GROUP
>
> I, the undersigned, do solemnly and sincerely declare and CERTIFY
UNDER 
> PENALTY OF PERJURY that:
>
> 1. I am the owner or an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner
of 
> certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named ATLANTIC 
> RECORDS GROUP ("IP Owner").
>
> 2. I have a good faith belief that the materials identified in the 
> addendum attached hereto are not authorized by the above IP Owner, its

> agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights
according 
> to the laws of the (check all that apply):
>
>
> United States
> Australia
> Brazil
> Canada
> EUR
> France
> Germany
> Italy
> Japan
> Netherlands
> Russia
> United Kingdom
> All of the above    X
>
> Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material
or 
> items claimed to be infringing.
>
> 3. I may be contacted at:
>
> Printed Name:  Dorothy Sherman
> Title:              Consultant
> Company:        Atlantic Records Group
> Address:         1290 Avenue of the Americas
>                     New York, NY  10104
>                     Attn:  Ariel Taitz, Esq.
>
> Email (correspondence): GrayZone@grayzone.com www.grayzone.com
> Telephone:  212 946-1718
> Fax:             718 552-3028
>
> You should understand that this letter constitutes notice to you that
the 
> sale and/or other distribution of this product is unauthorized. This 
> letter does not constitute a waiver of any right to recover damages 
> incurred by virtue of any such unauthorized activities, and such
rights as 
> well as claims for other relief are expressly retained.
>
> Finally, notwithstanding our use of the required notice form, we
believe 
> that putfile.com's activities and services fall outside the scope of
the 
> Digital Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA"). Our use of this form, as 
> required by putfile.com, is meant to facilitate putfile.com's removal
of 
> the
>
> infringing product listed above and is not meant to suggest or imply
that 
> putfile.com's activities and services are within the scope of the
DMCA.
>
> I make this declaration conscientiously, believing it to be true and 
> correct, and in accordance with the laws of each of the countries
listed 
> above.  I am aware and agree that the contents of this statement may
be 
> relied upon against me in any court or arbitration proceeding.
>
> Truthfully,
>
> Dorothy Sherman
> Digital Signature:  Verisign
>
>
> Date:  17 SEPTEMBER 2006
>
>
>
>
> ================================================
> CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE:  This e-mail message, and any attachments
thereto, 
> is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain
legally

use, 
> disclosure or distribution is strictly prohibited. If you are not the 
> intended recipient, please contact the sender by reply email and 
> permanently delete all copies of the original message.
> ================================================
>
dmca.principal_name: GrayZone, Inc. (For the Atlantic Records Group)
